tool_description: Provides crop-specific nutrient requirements and optimal soil conditions based on crop type, growth stage, and yield targets.

growth_stage.description: Current growth stage (seedling, vegetative, flowering, fruiting, maturity)

yield_target.description: Target yield in bushels/acre or tons/acre

error_messages: Unknown crop type: Specify a recognized crop name or common agricultural crop.
Invalid growth stage: Use seedling, vegetative, flowering, fruiting, or maturity.
Invalid yield target: Yield target must be a positive number.
usage: Specify crop_type for basic requirements. Add growth_stage and yield_target for stage-specific and high-yield recommendations.

optimal_ph_range.description: Optimal pH range for the crop [min, max]

nutrient_requirements.description: Required nutrient levels for optimal growth

critical_nutrients.description: Most important nutrients for this crop

nutrient_uptake_rates.description: Nutrient uptake rates in lbs per unit yield
